item.title: Making it so you cant equip certain thing in certain areas?

item.description:
@Mikeyofadown wrote:

if(iscwwr() && wearID != 4515)
{
sM("You can't remove your teams colors");
return false;
}

Try that.

item.source: Making it so you cant equip certain thing in certain areas?

item.title: Making it so you cant equip certain thing in certain areas?
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

I would like to make it so you can equip anything but a hood or cape when your in zammy castle wars waiting room but so far all I’ve got is you can’t equip anything thats not a “zamorak” hood in there. I don’t want to have to add all the other items you can equip 1 by 1. s there a way I could make it so you can equip anything that doesn’t go in the hood or cape slot in equipment? Anyone know how to make it so you can equip anything but capes and hats?

Here’s my current code…

if(izcwwr()==true && wearID != 4515){ //not equipping anything for hood in zammy waiting room sM("You can't remove your teams colors"); return false; }
Thanks, Moose

Read full topic
item.source: Making it so you cant equip certain thing in certain areas?
